alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 19 at 1:53PM AKDT until March 21 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with blizzard conditions at times. Total snow accumulations 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting to 60 mph. Visibility less than one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 PM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could cause whiteout conditions. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions are expected to develop at along the coast late tonight, and to spread inland early Monday morning. Snow and blowing snow are expected to continue into Tuesday. The strongest winds and worst conditions will be near the coast on Monday. Winds are expected to decrease Monday night.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
